snippet: Eric Chavez and Jeff Keppinger, two candidates to replace the injured Alex Rodriguez, chose other teams.
abstract: New York Yankees options for replacing injured third baseman Alex Rodriguez narrow after Eric Chavez and Jeff Keppinger reportedly reach agreements with teams.
lead_paragraph: Eric Chavez and Jeff Keppinger, two candidates to replace the injured Alex Rodriguez, chose other teams.

headline.seo: Yankees See Options at Third Base Shrinking
headline.main: Options at Third Base Shrinking for Yankees
headline.print_headline: Options at Third Base Shrinking for Yankees
